Package oopds.assignment.DC.services

Class DonationMadeService

java.lang.Object
oopds.assignment.DC.services.DonationMadeService
All Implemented Interfaces:
DonationService<DonationMade>
@Service public class DonationMadeService extends Object implements DonationService<DonationMade>
A Service Class to be used by the Spring API to do certain operations based on the method called. This service class contains the operations that involves the Donation Made Entity.
